programme.title: Seasons of the Sierra - Ambient Nature Film
programme.desc: Experience the spectacular seasons of the Sierra Mountains in this 3 hour film. From vast swaths of colorful aspens to sparkling wildflower meadows, the "Seasons of the Sierra" showcases the stunning beauty of the Range of Light.

programme.title: The Rise Of Fredia Gibbs
programme.desc: S1:E6 Fredia Gibbs was the first female African American kickboxing world champion who learned how to fight as a child because she grew up scared and afraid. It wasn’t until she unknowingly got into a van alone after a party with a man who turned out to be a serial killer, that all the years of fighting and training would help her unleash the power she had inside of her and catapult her to new heights.

programme.title: The Rise of Frank Shamrock
programme.desc: S1:E2 Frank Shamrock was one of the toughest fighters to ever compete in the UFC. He holds the world record for the fastest consecutive knockouts, but his biggest fight happened when he was a child, living with his stepfather. His stepfather emotionally abused him so devastatingly, that even when Frank was sent to a Juvenile Detention Center, the other kids couldn’t believe what he went through. While many kids would be crushed under such pain and suffering, Frank Shamrock was determined to prove why warriors always find a way to win.

programme.title: The Rise of Charity Witt
programme.desc: S1:E5 Dubbed The Worlds Strongest Barbie, Charity suffered a heart attack when she was only 17 years old, due to being overworked and poor life choices. This health crisis lead her to change her mindset by taking action on changing her life, that put her on a path that lead her to becoming an elite powerlifter, a Strongwoman competitor, a winner of the Titan Games and escaping an abusive relationship.

programme.title: Amber Rose vs. Kanye West
programme.desc: S1:E5 it true that Kanye West was harassing Amber Rose when she suddenly left him? When Kanye West started dating Amber Rose, he took her from the life of being a stripper to the global superstar world. At first, they seemed like a couple that was truly in love. But when Amber suddenly left Kanye, his attitude towards her completely changed. Our team uncovered the real story behind the tabloids of the years of bullying, unwanted media attention, and attacks that Amber had to suffer. The true story will reveal why she was the special woman Kanye fell in love with in the first place, and what she and Kim Kardashian have in common.

programme.title: Gwen Stefani vs. Gavin Rossdale
programme.desc: S1:E3 When Gwen Stefani’s happy 20-year relationship with Gavin Rossdale came crashing down, and she started dating Blake Shelton right after the divorce, the media went crazy. Discover the real story of the months of media torture Gwen had to go through, and where she is now in her new relationship with her new man.

programme.title: The Kardashians vs. Jordyn Woods
programme.desc: S1:E4 Jordyn Woods was somebody the Kardashian family trusted. But all that changed when rumours of her being a home wrecker emerged after a scandalous yet confusing night at a party with Khloé Kardashian’s then-boyfriend and NBA player, Tristan Thompson. Our team investigated both sides of the story and got the real truth about what happened that night.

programme.title: Cameron Vs. Justin & Jessica
programme.desc: S1:E13 Cameron Diaz was one of the biggest stars in the world. So why did she leave it all behind? Our team uncovers a link between Cameron’s explosive breakup with Justin Timberlake and her choice to leave acting behind. It all ties back to one question, did Justin cheat on Cameron?Justin sparked cheating rumors when he moved on from Cameron 4 days later with Jessica Biel. Our team gets to the truth behind those rumors to reveal the role Justin played in Cameron disappearing and the truth is even more shocking…

programme.title: Nicole Kidman vs. Tom Cruise
programme.desc: S1:E9 Was Scientology the reason why Tom Cruise divorced Nicole Kidman? Nicole was obsessed with Tom. She tried to do everything she could to be with the superstar at all times. But Tom had another obsession: Scientology. Then, when Tom Cruise suddenly divorced Nicole, the world she thought she was living in shattered into a million pieces. Was it because of Scientology? Was it the multiple miscarriages she had? Was it the wiretap Tom allegedly put on Nicole? This story was so uncovered, that our team had to dig deep to get the details.

programme.title: The Most Banned Author in America
programme.desc: Maya Angelou’s traumatic childhood changed the trajectory of her life. She lived in silence for many years, afraid for her safety and the safety of her loved ones. America couldn’t handle her truth when she finally shared what happened, and was quick to ban her story but it caught like wildfire. This story changed the world and yours can, too. Enjoy this new inspirational documentary!

programme.title: Jonny Kim Launched into Adulthood
programme.desc: Jonny Kim changed careers three times before he even turned 40! Who would believe that this highly decorated Navy SEAL, doctor, and NASA astronaut would be hiding a tragic secret about his past? In the end, what his colleagues have to say about him will bring you to tears.

programme.title: The Kardashian Redemption - The Unauthorized Documentary
programme.desc: When OJ Simpson destroyed her family, Kim Kardashian avenged her father, Robert Kardashian.

programme.title: Liz Murray - Resilience in the Streets
programme.desc: At the age of 15, Liz Murray was abandoned by her drug-addicted parents and living on the streets of New York City. Against all odds, she managed to finish high school and graduate from Harvard. How did she do it?

programme.title: Linda Cliatt-Wayman A Teacher Like No Other
programme.desc: Linda Cliatt-Wayman volunteered to be Principal of one of the most dangerous schools in America. On her first day, she quickly realized that the job was much more complex and frightening than she thought. But, she was determined to give her students hope, even when they were threatening her life.

programme.title: Lopez Lomong The Olympian Lost Boy
programme.desc: He went from running for his life to running to represent his country, seeing the worst human cruelties to life’s biggest blessings, and enduring years of hopelessness to experiencing the most fulfilling accomplishments. Lopez Lomong’s story proves what we can achieve if we make the most of the opportunities life gives us.

programme.title: Gloria Allred The Fight For Change
programme.desc: One of the most loved and controversial lawyers in the world, Gloria Allred is responsible for putting Harvey Weinstein behind bars… and now, she’s going after Prince Andrew and Ghislaine Maxwell. Why does she get involved in these high profile cases and why is it all so personal for her?

programme.title: Michael Jordan The Rise of an NBA Legend
programme.desc: Michael Jordan has lost almost 300 basketball games, but his most shocking loss is NOT what you think! His biggest loss came right after his worst nightmare came true, off the court. The secret truth behind the “Greatest Basketball Player Of All Time” finally came out when MJ’s suspicious loss led him down a “delusional” path. Why did Michael Jordan retire from basketball?

programme.title: Mandy Harvey Feeling the Music
programme.desc: When Mandy Harvey completely lost her hearing, her dreams of a career in music came crashing down! Although she could not even hear her own voice, her family encouraged her to pursue her passion and NEVER QUIT. Thats when she went on Americas Got Talent and SHOCKED the entire nation, including Simon Cowell himself!

programme.title: The Fear in Their Eyes
programme.desc: Unable to pay for his son’s chemotherapy, retired boxer Isea ‘Ice’ Jackson is forced to face off against the most dangerous man alive - undefeated champion Kurt ‘The Mountain’ Backstrom. If Jackson wins, he’ll earn enough money to save his son. But if Backstrom wins, Max could die. How far would you go to save your child’s life?

programme.title: Blue or Red pill?
programme.desc: Mindvalley founder Vishen Lakhiani shares the secret to success and teaches a confused student how to make the right decisions in life. The choice is yours: Will you take the blue pill or the red pill?

programme.title: Why Are More Americans Feeling TRAPPED In Advantage Plans
programme.desc: In todays episode Marvin Musick from Medicare School puts special focus on Medicare Advantage Plans. He compares the three main Medicare choices: Original Medicare (Parts A and B), Medigap (supplemental insurance), and Medicare Advantage Plans. He underscores the financial vulnerabilities of relying solely on Original Medicare and the advantages of considering either Medigap or Medicare Advantage Plans to counter these risks. Marvin also addresses the critical concerns surrounding Medicare Advantage Plans. He highlights how these plans, while initially appealing due to their low upfront costs and additional services like dental care, can later reveal hidden limitations and unexpected expenses. This is a episode you WONT want to miss!

programme.title: Afterlife
programme.desc: Afterlife is a compelling and thought-provoking documentary that follows the personal journey of a filmmaker as he explores the mysteries of the hereafter. Driven by a deep sense of curiosity and a desire to find answers to life's ultimate questions, he meets with a diverse range of experts, including spiritual teachers, scientists, and medical professionals to gain insights into what happens when we die. As the filmmaker delves deeper into the subject, he begins to see how the exploration of the afterlife is more than just a matter of life and death. It reveals the spiritual connections we all share, and the importance of living a meaningful life. Ultimately, Afterlife is a personal and emotional journey of self-discovery, as the filmmaker grapples with his own beliefs and fears about what lies beyond this world. The film offers a poignant and uplifting message that death is not the end, but a doorway to a new beginning.

Anything is Possible with Patrick Tsang
programme.desc: Patrick Tsang climbed Mount Kenya with his team, disconnecting from his phone for five days. Although challenging, Patrick enjoyed the experience and successfully reached the summit.

programme.title: Bitcoin Jesus: The Prosecution of Roger Ver
programme.desc: They call him “Bitcoin Jesus,” though he despises the nickname. His real name is Roger Ver. At any moment, Roger could be arrested for alleged tax evasion and mail fraud. But anyone familiar with his case knows the truth: Roger’s only “crime” was being the very first investor and passionate advocate for Bitcoin. For that, he faces 109 years in federal prison. As devastating as this is for Roger, this case is less about him and more about you.

programme.title: Spotlight: New York City Mayor Eric Adams at Bitcoin 2025 conference in Las Vegas
programme.desc: New York City Mayor Eric Adams made a prominent appearance at the Bitcoin 2025 conference in Las Vegas, held from May 27 to May 29, 2025.

programme.title: Revolutionizing Real-World Assets: The Role of Ease Protocol in Blockchain Integration
programme.desc: Join us for an insightful episode of The Edge of Show as we dive deep into the world of blockchain technology with Douglas Horn, founder of Ease Protocol. In this episode, we explore the potential of stable coins as the next monetary revolution and their implications for global economies. Douglas shares his expertise on the challenges of blockchain adoption, particularly the user experience issues that have historically plagued the crypto space. We discuss how Ease Protocol is addressing these challenges with enterprise-ready solutions that make blockchain accessible and compliant for businesses and governments. Key topics include: The evolution of stable coins and their role in redefining payments and settlements. The importance of user experience in driving crypto adoption compared to AI. How Ease Protocol is building tools for both consumers and enterprises to facilitate seamless blockchain integration. The potential for real-world asset platforms and government applications of blockchain technology.

programme.title: Quilt Along
programme.desc: This season we promised detailed step by steps for a new topic: quilting. Most of this episode is devoted to quilt techniques – at home in a quilt but also used in many sewing projects. First, it’s time for our Sew Along with Angela Wolf - adding the hem to your top. Then Joanne Banko has a patchwork coaster – 2 ways - it's jam packed with techniques for a quick gift. Last Ebony Love has her version of the flying geese block featuring chevrons and she has project ideas using the block and poly beads.

programme.title: Off Our Needles
programme.desc: Hold onto your needles! Tracie and Jodi, are here to dish out fresh fiber inspiration. From project picks to wooly good gossip, things are about to get super knitty… and maybe just a little nutty.

programme.title: Write It Down
programme.desc: When creative ideas pop up, write them down. Make a colorful pocket journal with Jenny Barnett-Rohrs. Candie Cooper shares creative tips for handwriting and Franz Spohn writes with clay. Katie Hacker decorates for fall with a shining pumpkin luminary from blogger Carissa Bonham.

programme.title: Stylish
programme.desc: Freshen up your style statement. Jenny Barnett-Rohrs fashions a colorful ID bracelet from clay and makes a foxy felt animal pouch. Jenny weaves a trendy beaded bracelet of silver and gold. Then, using fabric and ribbon, Jenny creates a decorator-style memo board to stay organized.

programme.title: Mixing Simple Metal Smithing with Stringing
programme.desc: Designer and author Candie Cooper has a unique lesson on coordinating your jewelry pieces. She creates simple layered earrings and then a knotted necklace. She also shares a tool tip for using a hammer and anvil. Katie's Beading Lesson is about coiled bead bracelets to suit any style.

programme.title: Sparkle and Shine
programme.desc: Make your style sparkle and shine. Designer and author Ashley Bunting expresses her upbeat style through leather, beading and wirework. In her Beading Lesson, Katie Hacker creates a layered birthstone necklace you can make for yourself or give as a gift.

programme.title: Add-ons
programme.desc: Soup would be pretty boring if it was just broth. Scrapbook pages might also suffer the same fate without some interesting add-ons to rev them up. Explore beyond the norm with media mixage with Stacey Caron, add bezels, ribbon and buttons to create texture and dimension. Make a die cut frame with Jenny Barnett Rohrs and use up scraps of patterned paper in a grid design with Ronda Palazzari. Today's Scrapbook Soup is stocked with new ingredients.

programme.title: Paper
programme.desc: A blank piece of paper challenges every maker. Illustrator Roxanne Coble balances humor and emotional themes in abstract mini-canvases. Lettering artist Janet Takahashi showcases calligraphy with decorative borders. Joe Rotella uses the today's design and cutting technology to create a mosaic box top. In the tip, Dina Wakley creates tags with paint and stamps.

programme.title: The Midnight Quilt Show
programme.desc: Say hello to The Midnight Quilt Show, a series that celebrates late-night stitches, taking shortcuts and sewing in your PJs! Each week, host Angela Walters will bring you a quick and quippy breakdown of a brand new quilt… wine not included.

programme.title: Joaquin Murietta
programme.desc: The 1850's California gold fields is home to notorious bandit Joaquin Murietta. Matt and Frankie arrive to track him down but he kidnaps Frankie. Matt and Captain Love trail Murietta to the bitter end. Original Air Date: 4/16/54.

programme.title: LOVE IS NOT ENOUGH
programme.desc: A filmmaker is given a commission to make a pop video but takes the money and attempts to complete his own long term film project. He takes to the road and tries to re-engage his old cast but finds them no longer interested in the film. Things go from bad to worse when the crew he has managed to recruit also decide to bail out. This is a film about perseverance in the face of adversity.

programme.title: THE GOLDEN POMEGRANTE
programme.desc: Noa, a famous Israeli singer of Yemenite descent, prepares for a concert in Jerusalem. She is interrupted by an old Arab man who claims to have been her great-grandmothers close friend. He tells her about Mazal, a Jewish child-bride from Yemen, who preserves her religion, culture, family, and unique art, surviving the harsh, violent conditions of Jerusalem and the Holy Land in the late 19th through the mid-20th centuries. She becomes the mother of two, a young widow, and the familys breadwinner through her skills as a jeweler in gold and silver. In time, a woman of property and an ardent patriot, she prevails through the unfolding bloody decades while living in the Old City of Jerusalem. She heads a family of extraordinary, unforgettable characters and grows old in strength and determination, remaining true to her traditions and ideals.

programme.title: BAD KITTIES
programme.desc: The Marcomb County Police Department obtains footage of several troubled teenage girls documenting violent and disturbing behaviors. Criminal cases are pending on several of the seen individuals in the film.

programme.title: Naayagi Episode 36
programme.desc: Nayagi is a 2018 Indian Tamil-language Family Drama series. It premiered on 19 February 2018 on Sun TV, replacing Deivamagal, and was replaced by Anbe Vaa and it ended on 31 October 2020. The show was produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S Kumaran. Nayagi was also re-aired on Kalaignar TV from 1 March 2021 and it ended its run on 9 July 2022 Plot Anandhi, a middle-class woman, struggles to keep her life together while dealing with an alcoholic father and his debts. programme.title: THE WATERFALL OF LIFE
programme.desc: The balance and harmony of the Yan World are knocked out of whack when Negu sends a giant mutant toad to plug up the Waterfall of Life. The Guardians have to drive off the toad and repair the stone lotus through which the water flows. Balance and harmony are restored!

programme.title: BOLT-ADE
programme.desc: Peelville is plagued by a lightning-charged beverage that is the latest weapon in the arsenal of an intergalactic megalomaniac.

programme.title: Love in the World
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: Rainbow Show
programme.desc: Its the day of the Extreme Glow Rainbow. Zip wants to prove shes her own Smighty without her twin brother, Zap, so she grabs hold of the Air Stone which she cannot control. The Air region twists and turns and the Smighties need to be saved from the Villains trap.

programme.title: JOY RIDE
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to clean the Lord of the Wind. They can’t resist riding the annual Surf Winds, but Xia and April end up captured by the Wind Beast. Pai rescues them by repulsing the sensitive Wind Beast with his onion and sulfur-geyser stink.

programme.title: The Gingerbread Man
programme.desc: Old couple without a child bakes a gingerbread kid GoGo. GoGo escapes the oven, and runs away from the animals who try to eat him.

programme.title: How To Ride A Bike
programme.desc: Colonel has gifted Don a brand new bike. But Don cant ride even to save his life! Colonel trains him but in vain! He bumps into other cars, stalls, crops until he finally bumps into Ballu!

programme.title: MALAI KAM CHAI
programme.desc: Shantappa, a coconut seller has put his stall right next to hotel California. Sundar attracts customers by showing his antics. However, things change when Basha meddles in and joins the rival party. Soon the healthy competition turns into unending events of nuisance where the customers from both the stalls have to bear the brunt.

programme.title: Good Luck, Bad Luck
programme.desc: The lucky amulet April has bought arrives in the mail. Pai and Xia make fun of her – until they see that April is suddenly top in every discipline. First Pai and then Xia steals her amulet, and whoever has it wins at everything. They are arguing over who should keep the amulet, when Maestro Woof reveals it wasn’t the amulet April bought at all. It was a pumice stone that he had ordered. The Guardians realize that good luck doesn’t depend on outside factors but comes from inside themselves.

programme.title: OH, RATS!
programme.desc: It’s quiet…TOO quiet, according to Pai, who’s convinced Negu’s about to attack. Pai prepares a trap. But the evil lord of the Chou World is depressed by all his failures. Mei decides to launch an attack himself. He can only get one mutant rat to follow him…who in turn is followed by lots of fellow mutant rats. The Guardians laugh at Mei and his rats, but the rats have a secret weapon: horrible, high-pitched SCREAMS! Pai knits earmuffs for himself, April, and Xia, then lures the rats onto his trap with cheese. In the end, Pai savors the silence.

programme.title: Three Little Pigs
programme.desc: Three little pigs decide to leave home and live separately for their own good. Little pigs each build a house to live in until a wolf makes an appearance.

programme.title: CHARMED, I SAY
programme.desc: Sundar is flipping through old film magazines in his break time when he hears a shriek from right outside the tea shop. Leaning out he sees a woman point at something just at the door. Chai Raja swoops out and in a deft move ensnares whatever it was in a rat-trap. He hands over the small harmless trap to Sundar. Sundar takes the trap and opens it only to find a small benign rattlesnake (female at that!) glide out. The female snake has a fixation on Sundar and follows him back to the hotel, causing havoc in the hotel. For once Sundar has an ally against Basha, but the obsessive snake is more a bane than a boon as Chai Raja is in danger of losing all its customers. Sundar must now tactfully rid the simpering snake off before he too is forced to slither out of the tea shop once and for all.

programme.title: Office Fiasco
programme.desc: Don gets a new office job and he is so excited to begin. Are the rats equally excited?? well they are – but for something else. With their pranks and tricks, Larry Marly and Charly make sure that Don doesnt reach his office. But, when he somehow reaches the office, they make sure that the boss throws him out finally.

programme.title: LOCKED UP
programme.desc: After his Mutant Octopus is defeated, Negu decides to attack the Guardians himself with a Mutant Meerkat. The Guardians capture him, and the Elders have Negu locked up near the Magic Fort. The Mutant Meerkat tunnels into the fort so Negu can steal the Glove of the North – his plan all along. The Guardians rush to stop him, but Negu ties them up with his Lasso of Doom – until Pai gnaws through it and temporarily EATS the Glove of the North!

programme.title: Shrink O Matic
programme.desc: The Creepy Candy TM sneak into Victors secret laboratory looking for adventure and discover his newest experiment The Shrinkomatic! Just as Victor gets back and discovers the Creepy Candy TM they accidentally activate the shrink ray with hilarious consequences. Will they be able return to their normal size before Miss Paige finds out? Tune into this exciting episode to see how the mystery ends!

programme.title: Blackberry Tea
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: See The Problem
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: Gummy, Harry and Kala head off to a scary Halloween costume party – but the winner of the ‘Best Costume’ prize.... isn’t wearing a costume, and is actually a real monster!

programme.title: Paintastic
programme.desc: Dunky has been entrusted the task of painting the house. While he is out and about religiously doing his chores a wild chase between Keet and Cat is going on in the background.

programme.title: LOVE IS BLIND
programme.desc: Fulfilling the Elders’ assignment to wrangle clouds, Pai falls in love with a rodent girl named Lol. But Lol proves to be one of Negu’s mutants, intent on stealing the Glove of the North.

programme.title: A Bumpy Trek
programme.desc: Don and Colonel went up the hill, to feast a platter, Colonel fell down and broke his bones and Don came tumbling after. Rocky terrain of the magic mountain and a sleepy Don is indeed a disastrous combination. So what you think awaits the team on the peak of this mountain?

programme.title: CHAPPAR PHAD KE!
programme.desc: Customers are complaining about the taste of the tea. Chai raja cant concentrate in preparation as the Radio is going on and off due to weak signal. Chai Raja orders Sundar to climb the roof of the tea stall and hold the radio for better signal. This is the golden opportunity for Basha, with Sundar on the roof; there is no one to guard the tea. That is not it. Basha tries everything possible to make the radio signals go crazy thereby making Chai Raja go crazier and Sundar running for his dear life!

programme.title: Robot Maid
programme.desc: GrandPA gets a big courier box at his doorstep voila ! it’s a robot maid and she is very efficient in the house within minutes she sparkles the house.

programme.title: Flash Blind
programme.desc: Don rips apart the parcel and out comes A Brand New Camera! Don is on a clicking spree. He makes colonel pose and ends up clicking Ballu. From friends to enemies to the innards of his tummy, he captures it all.

programme.title: The Big Freeze
programme.desc: Charlie is found napping on the job. Deedee and Nino encourage him as being the best postman ever and that anyone would doze off in the sweltering heat. Charlie assures Tiggy that he will take special care of Tiggy’s parcel and off he goes near fainting in the sweaty heat. Charlie even turns down the twins offer to help. In the heat, Charlie makes a wrong turn and reaches town-hall instead of Tiggy’s home, but still presses on to accomplish his mission. En route the special package starts to leak unawares of Charlie who is too tired and stops for a “quick” nap after nearly bumping into the Doobydoos. Deedee and Nino are searching for Charlie and find him at long last. Dejected, Charlie calls himself the worst postman in the world having melted all of Tiggy’s vanilla ice-cream. Charlie wishes Deedee to use her magic, much to the horror of Nino who hides off. Deedee’s magic refreezes not only the ice-cream, but Charlie as well! Rounding up Deedee’s friends they all take turns in delivering the letters and special parcel to keep Charlie’s goodwill intact. Mewmew is too fast that the letters fly our of the bag and the Doobydoos are too short to reach the mail boxes and the twins have a tough time reading the addresses. Finally all the tired and thoroughly perspired friends acknowledge how great Charlie is as a postman. As Charlie is now free to move, they are all surprised by Tiggy’s special delivery of ice-creams he specially made for him favourite postman. Charlie gets a well deserved nap right in front of his giggling friends.

programme.title: Rainy Blues
programme.desc: Relentless rain and a hot cup of black tea, what more could Don ask for. Raindrops at home? As Don and Colonel take different measures to seal the cracks. Cement, tarpaulin sheets and umbrellas! The trio make sure that it isn’t an easy task.

programme.title: Shy Tommy Prickles
programme.desc: Mewmew is all set for her party but didn’t have sufficient time to handout the invitations. Deedee and Nino agree to help. They soon invite all of Abra-Dabra, but Tommy Prickles isn’t so keen on attending, because he feels so very shy. But as Deedee doesn’t have any spell to make Tommy’s shyness go away she improvises without magic by making Tommy believe that she has cast a spell on Tommy’s hat. Tommy agrees to attend the party in the guise that the hat he is wearing is now a chatter hat that will help him talk to others at the party. Nino is confused as he’s happy on one side that magic wasn’t used but sad that Tommy thinks magic is used. Tommy Prickles fits right in at the party and has fun playing with the Doobydoos and talks so freely and happily with everyone. Just then a huge gust of wind ruffles everything including Tommy’s hat. Poor sad Tommy feels so shy and helpless that he wants to go back home. But Deedee implores him to stay by trying to make him hopeful that Nino would return soon with Tommy’s hat. Tommy slumps on the ground and won’t budge, not until Deedee gets Tommy to don Tiggy’s baker hat. Tommy jumps springs back up and rounds all the party goers to teach them his very own special Wiggly Worm dance. Just then as they all dance in a bee-line behind Tommy, Nino flies in with Tommy’s hat. A confused Tommy discovers that he was wearing Tiggy’s hat till then and is flabbergasted to know that Deedee didn’t work any magic into the hat all along. Tommy Prickles runs away crying. Tommy reasons with Deedee that all of Abra-Dabra will think of him as silly, but Deedee tells him that if he couldn’t believe her, then to at least believe those who love having him along. Tommy looks up to see all his friends walking up to him doing the Wiggly Worm dance. Tommy takes a brave step and listens to his friends wanting have him back. He joins them just the way he is, without his ‘magic’ hat. Deedee finally agrees with Nino that sometimes no magic is good.

programme.title: Sponge
programme.desc: Soak up the creativity like a sponge would, lets see what Hepi and Briko are up to

programme.title: Talent Show
programme.desc: As Dunky warms up the milk in the morning he hears the “The Great Indian talent show” announcement coming to town. He’s all excited. He goes to his room , gets out his old song record disk - blows off the dust and puts it on the gramophone .

programme.title: Cat Romance
programme.desc: Its a lovely morning suddenly gone berserk as Cat comes charging in to catch Keet. He opens his jaw wide open when he stops…viola …a beautiful white kitten with big dapping eyelashes and eyes as blue as the clear ocean

programme.title: A Zoonicorn Followed Me Home
programme.desc: When Odessa can’t take a trip to visit her grandmother, a visit from the Zoonicorns inspires her to rediscover the wonderful things there are to do around her very own home. Appreciating that everyday things can be and are special.

programme.title: Happy ending
programme.desc: The twins jump into a story and find out that the characters are stuck, because the last pages of the book are missing. So the twins invent the ending themselves, discovering the power of imagination, and when they go back home they understand they can create a new recipe with the ingredients they’ve got.

programme.title: Not like us
programme.desc: The twins help a little frog who is discriminated against because of her colour.

programme.title: The New Otter In Town
programme.desc: After thinking that his mother doesnt know what its like to be a kid, in the Zooniverse, Pancake becomes friends with a fun otter kid - who turns out to be his mom!. Judging people/People are often more than what they seem

programme.title: Where is it?
programme.desc: During a game of hide and seek Deedee and Nino come across a panicky Mewmew who cannot locate his key. Deedee creates a spell to get back all of Mewmew’s missing things and in come his key, including his long lost bubble-cordion and pocket fork. But Mewmew doesn’t want those things back as he had already replaced them. So Deedee offers to keep them as she couldn’t stand the sight of them being thrown away. On the way they find Charlie hiding from his lost but newly found alarm clock that is chasing him. The clock won’t let Charlie sleep a bit by ringing all the time, so Deedee offers to take it along with the rest. Deedee gets many more additions to her lost and found group as many more citizens of Abra-Dabra are affected with lost things. But as Deedee doesn’t have any space to store them, she puts up a give-away store. Now everyone’s happy.

programme.title: Health On My Mind
programme.desc: Colonel is in the hospital for his annual medical check-up along with Don. But Lary Marly and Charly want fun at their cost. This time, their target is poor Colonel. And Don is a helpless and frightened witness. At last colonel and don run out of the hospital to save their health.

programme.title: Bobby's Day Out
programme.desc: The loose motion has caught on to Cat, when he agrees to babysit his neighboring cat Katreena’s neice for the afternoon.

programme.title: The Dance
programme.desc: Speed and the gang discover that the Mach 6s mysterious jump capability is actually related to Time Travel. Meanwhile the Shadowy Org. is remotely using a device to affect Speeds control over the Mach 6s jumps. Speed realizes this device is what controls the cars ability to jump through time and that it could be the missing part of the Mach 6 engine. They discover that when the parts are combined, the Mach 6 will be a fully functional time machine.

programme.title: Honey bees Attack
programme.desc: Cat is relaxing in a hammock under the coconut trees at the back of the house reading a newspaper item of an exotic insect whose sting can kill.

programme.title: Where’s Nino?
programme.desc: Nino is trying to have a non-magic game time with Deedee, but she wants just the opposite. So she conjures a invisi-ball game. But the spell bounces off the ball and makes Nino invisible instead. Deedee is sad her spell went cuckoo on Nino, but Nino can’t stand her magic any more, so she checks out a remedy in her magic book and finds that the spell would cancel itself with three chimes of the town hall bell. Deedee decides to get Nino to the spot at the earliest. Nino scares the Doobydoos in his new ‘form’, but soon gets them to play along as he removes his helmet and is completely invisible now. Nino loves the fact that he is invisible and plays tricks on sleepy Charlie. Deedee sees the Doobydoos playing with the helmet and think they are throwing Nino about. But when she realizes that Nino isn’t in it, she is even more worried as the spell can become permanent if it isn’t cancelled soon. Nino has lots of fun playing pranks on Tiggy, Deedee, Charlie and Mewmew. Nino soon realizes that his pranks have gone out of hand that Mayor De Pfeffle announces over the loudspeaker to get Nino to come to them. Nino appears and is stubborn to stay invisible, so Deedee catches Nino with her hat and gets him in place to take full effect of the town hall chimes. Having regained his visibility, Nino agrees that a little magic is fun.

programme.title: Roller-Skates.
programme.desc: Gummy decides to take up roller-skating – and everybody else’s world winds up being turned upside-down.

programme.title: Yes Gummy
programme.desc: Feeling a little ‘blah’, Gummy decides to say ‘yes’ to everything that crosses his path. Comic disaster, naturally, soon follows...

programme.title: Friends or Foes
programme.desc: Its friendship day and Dunky makes both Keet and Cat share friendship bands with each other and makes them promise to maintain friendship for a day at least.

programme.title: Hokus croakus!
programme.desc: The twins make peace between a witch and a young girl whos been messing with her book of spells.

programme.title: GAME OVER
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to climb a mountain and ring a bell. Seeing his henchmen distracted by an old videogame, Negu sends the game up to the Yan World to distract the Guardians. Xia and Pai become obsessed with the game, stealing it back and forth from each other.

programme.title: Knot My Problem
programme.desc: Maple keeps forgetting how to tie her shoes until Promi shows her a way to remember. Practice makes perfect, and perseverance leads to achievement.

programme.title: Catch That Bird
programme.desc: Don has adopted a baby pigeon, but can he save it from 5 grumbling tummies? The three mice, Balu and Colonel are adamant on having baby pigeon pie and a mighty havoc ensues. But the kin & kith of the little pigeon have other plans and you have to watch to find out who ultimately ends up on the stove!

programme.title: Bicycle Chase
programme.desc: It’s a lovely day . Dunky is busy oiling his old cycle - until Cat comes around snatches the cycle , removes its wheels and rolls it to the top of the house chasing Keet even on the electric cables.

programme.title: Bored
programme.desc: Kala is bored, and Gummy and Harry’s attempts to snap her out of it wind up having unexpected results.

programme.title: The liquorice touch
programme.desc: The twins encounter Liquorice, a girl who turns everything she touches into something sweet. After a moment of enthusiasm they discover that she is not so happy about her talent

programme.title: Christmas Episode
programme.desc: Its Christmas time and Gummy Bear and all his pals are out to celebrate Christmas. They are going to have some serious fun along with some surprises!!

programme.title: A Book for a Book
programme.desc: Cat is sick of Keet winning all the time. He runs through the newspapers and sees an ad of a book ”10 ways to catch a parrot”.

programme.title: The rudest crab that ever was
programme.desc: The twins give a grumpy Crab a lesson in good manners.

programme.title: The Cup Final – Snow Queen
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the story of the SNOW QUEEN, by Hans Christian Andersen, having been called out by GERDA, a young girl, whose best friend, KAY, has been whisked off by a white sleigh, driven by an enigmatic woman dressed in white furs. She is the SNOW QUEEN, who has taken KAY to her palace at the North Pole. After a kiss from the SNOW QUEEN, the boy has lost all his memories and is now a prisoner in the palace of ice. SANDRA and FO will have to find him and rescue him from the powerful Lady of Winter.

programme.title: SCHOOL’S OUT!
programme.desc: When the Elders sail off to play Bingo, Pai and Xia say it’s party time! They get April to dance, but she loses her fan, which falls down to the Chou World. Amkko and Koto use it to fly up to the Yan World on the giant mutant chicken. While April distracts the mutants with tango lessons, Xia and Pai send the chicken packing.

programme.title: The Lord, Lost
programme.desc: When Xia and April go to fetch Pai after he’s spent the night guarding the Magic Fort, they find out that the Glove of the North has disappeared. While they blame Pai for the disaster, Amkko and Koto steal the Lord of the Wind. The Guardians try to get it back, only to discover it was all a cunning plan to distract them and steal the Glove of the North! But hadn’t they stolen it already? No! Pai was keeping it safe in a place they would never have guessed.

programme.title: The Vegetarians
programme.desc: We start the episode with Cat holding an upset stomach and at doctors place with Dunky and Keet. The doctor tells him he cannot have non veg and should be on a veg diet.

programme.title: Meep Meep Charlie’s
programme.desc: Boris and Sandy are fighting over the water sprayer and drenching Uncle Charlie with it. This leaves Charlie with no choice but to call on Deedee’s magic. Deedee finds a spell to make friendship dust as the perfect solution. Whoever the dust falls on will be best friends with whoever they see first. Happy for getting the magic powder they all set off to see Boris and Sandy. But on the way the Doobydoos rush at them so suddenly that they fall all over them and the Doobydoos become friends of Charlie and carry him off. Nino tries to explain the situation to Deedee, but she is too busy to listen. Back over at Charlie’s, the Doobydoos are treating him as a king and tries to run away from his new friends. Deedee finds some of the missing magic powder but tries to find Charlie. Deedee tries to bring things back to normal with magic, but Nino is against it. They find a way to get the twins to work together and splash the Doobydoos with water and wash off the friendship dust. The twins are friends again even though Deedee’s magic didn’t work as expected.

programme.title: Nardilicious
programme.desc: Its the annual Cake Festival and the Villains have tampered with Nardys famous recipe, causing the Super Sixs heads to swell and get stuck together. Can they figure out how to use their powers together to stop Sneevil from stealing the Smighty Stones?

programme.title: Day At The Spa
programme.desc: Don and Colonel want to pamper themselves. Yes!! a complete spa treatment. And when Larry Marly and Charly enter the scene, spa becomes a punishment for Don and Colonel. But when they are at their wits end, the dogs make sure that, the naughty rats learn a lesson. How does the twist happen??

programme.title: GET THAT GLOVE
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to guard the Glove of the North in the Magic Fort. Amkko and Koto attack the fort with a Rock-Eating Mutant. The Guardians manage (eventually) to transform into the Dragon, Panther, and Rodent Warriors to drive them off.

programme.title: BirthDay Party
programme.desc: Its GrandPAs birthday and Keet and Cat are given the task of decorating the house while Dunky is planning to make a nice cake for the evening party.

programme.title: Super Hero Don
programme.desc: Don get super powers when he gets thrown to another planet. And when he returns, it is a tough time for Larry Marly and Charly. Now it is the reign of Don - the super hero. But, it all changes when the rats get super powers!! gosh! What will happen to Don now???

programme.title: Shapeshifter
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Assaf The Magician – Aladdin
programme.desc: On this occasion, SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the tale of “Aladdin and the Magic Lamp”. The Sultan, the PRINCESS’s father, requires their detective services, as the evil magician ASSAF has returned and has stolen ALADDIN’s lamp. Not content with this, the perfidious magician has ordered the GENIE kill ALADDIN and then take his palace, with the PRINCESS inside, and transport it to his lair, in the distant Atlas Mountains. SANDRA will face the most powerful magician in the Thousand and One Nights with her only weapon: her ingenuity.

programme.title: Fred Gets Crushed
programme.desc: Fred thinks Brains is acting strangely, and decides it’s because she has a secret crush on his best friend Sir Percival. Fred secretly spies on them to learn their secret, only to embarrass himself in the process.

programme.title: The Garden Guardians
programme.desc: The Wise Elders ask the Guardians to take care of their vegetable garden while they go on a trip. Xia and April think it’s the dullest job ever, but Pai is over the moon. Negu seizes the chance to send his Mutant Beetles, who try to wreck the garden, making Pai’s life impossible. He has to use a secret known only to the most green-fingered gardeners to beat the Mutants and save the garden.

programme.title: Prickly Pair
programme.desc: Nino is having a tough time trying to put his daisies up as desired to win the Wonderful Window Box competition that Mayor De Pfeffle is hosting. Deedee cheers him up by saying that flowers can be placed anywhere as long as it makes Abra-Dabra more beautiful. Just then Mewmew runs in all flustered and panicky. The problem seems to be that the creeper plant at Mewmew’s window hasn’t grown big enough to creep all around the heart-shaped support. But Deedee can’t help with magic, as it would be unfair in the competition against everyone else. Charlie loves his display but is being overprotective by shooing the twins away to play ball elsewhere. The twins accidentally throw the ball directly at Uncle Charlie’s display, knocking them all down and breaking them in the process. But there’s no time to fix them up without magic. Deedee brews a magic potion with a few ingredients. The magic potion makes all of Charlie’s flowers into cacti, something Charlie dislikes the most. Since Deedee feels she’s let Charlie down, they all decide to take theor very own flowers to replace Charlie’s exhibit. But with a sudden spelt of rain, all are damaged by the time they reach Charlie’s. But the rain has also caused the cacti to bloom, a rare sight indeed. Mayor De Pfeffle awards Uncle Charlie with the honour of being winner of the Wonderful Window Boz contest. But Charlie wants to share the award with all his friends

programme.title: Balloons to Baghdad
programme.desc: Jamillah brings balloons to Baghdad and everyone is thrilled with this new invention, they sell one to everyone, even the Grand Vizier buys one for the Princess. Suddenly they hear a popping sound! Jamillah explains to Aladdin that is what happens to balloons but the people of Baghdad are not happy, they all want their money back. Jamillah and Aladdin hide when they hear the sound of the Grand Vizier approaching. Samir tries to convince them to face the music but luckily they dont have to -it turns out the Princess loves the popping balloons and only wanted to come to thank Jamillah and Aladdin for bringing such joy to Baghdad!

programme.title: Hamster in the House.
programme.desc: Friendly and lovable ‘mad scientist’ Granny Peters accidentally transforms her cute little pet hamster.... into a not-so-cute HUGE pet hamster – and things get interesting when it escapes and decides to move into Gummy’s place uninvited.

programme.title: “Cuppa” Chase
programme.desc: Don is pouring HOT TEA into his cup from a kettle.He takes the cup and sits down at the table.OPENS the newspaper and begins to read. But as he raises the cup for a sip, all the tea is gone. Its Don chasing the mice all the way, in hopes to have a peaceful tea break!

programme.title: Bottle Racquet
programme.desc: Fred and friends don’t have a place to play “Laser Ball.” An eccentric environmentalist inspires Fred to build his own island out of discarded plastic water bottles. When Friday is sent to collect a quarter million of them, he turns into a plastic water bottle menace!

programme.title: Hello Pinkar!
programme.desc: Dada, an explorer, and his amazing Pinkar camping car crash in the Unknown Forest. He soon meets Bubbles, the forgetful fish, Caber, the know-it-all beaver, and Doubt, the happy mole. The sudden arrival of Dada and Pinkar ruins the presentation of Scottie Buddys new invention. So Scot, the self-proclaimed "greatest inventor of the Unknown Forest" and Piggy and Puggy, the crazy owl brothers, go to find out what has happened. As soon as Scot sets his eyes on Pinkar, its love at first sight. He decides he should have it for himself. He suggests having a race, Pinkar against Scottie Buddy, and the winner gets a wish. Motivated to win, Scot ends up going too fast, but when he tries to slow down he realizes he forgot to brake his invention. What will happen to Scot and who will win?

programme.title: The Feast
programme.desc: GrandPA has some special guests visiting him. GrandPA tells Dunky in the morning to have a very tasty and mouth watering fish curry prepared for them.

programme.title: GIVEAWAY
programme.desc: The Elders assign lots of chores to the Guardians. To get them to mellow out, Pai prepares a special dish. They become so mellow they start giving away all their possessions. Seeing an opportunity, Negu sends his henchmen to ask for the Glove of the North. Koto and Amkko fail, so Negu sends Mei and the Mutant Raccoon in disguise. The Mutant Raccoon ends up smashing himself in the face with the nunchucks given to Pai by the Elders.

programme.title: El último pétalo
programme.desc: El esposo de Gulia muere en una pelea y ella se queda en la calle, sin dinero, sin documentos y embarazada.

programme.title: La asistente
programme.desc: En su nuevo trabajo, Lucy descubrirá el amor, la mentira y secretos que podrían poner en riesgo su vida.

programme.title: La asistente

programme.title: Soul Detective
programme.desc: "An officer from the underworld joins forces with a policeman to track down evil spirits that have escaped to the mortal realm. Together, they explore the good and evil of human nature. This drama combines traditional and modern elements to bring a new fantasy experience to the audience. "

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: LAZY EVENING
programme.desc: This show delivering non-stop jams and high-energy Beats.

programme.title: PUNJABI TADKA
programme.desc: This show delivering non-stop jams and high-energy Beats.

programme.title: BHANGRA FEVER

programme.title: The Underground World-1943
programme.desc: Lois Lane and an explorer set out on an expedition through an underground cavern and discover a race of hawk-men. When these creatures prepare a ritual sacrifice for the adventurous pair, Superman comes to the rescue.

programme.title: Betty Boop and the Little King 1936
programme.desc: The Little King, comic strip character, meets Betty Boop.

programme.title: Land of the Lost Jewels 1950
programme.desc: Two children are fishing when they catch a talking fish named Red Lantern. He takes them underwater with him to the Land of the Lost, where missing items can be found again. They meet King Find All, a walrus, and a singing cricket (Hoppy-Go-Lucky) that used to be the girl's pin. He's deemed to be a special jewel (since he's made of emerald) and is brought to the jewel storage room, despite his wishes to be in the Land of the Toys. He runs away from Queen Tiara's guards, but is caught, and when they test him for authenticity they find he is only a fake diamond, after which he is allowed to live in the Land of the Toys after all. The children return to the surface and say goodbye to Red Lantern.

programme.title: Superman: Billion Dollar Limited-1950
programme.desc: Superman battles train robbers seeking to steal a billion dollars worth of gold.

programme.title: Tokyo Woes-1945

programme.title: Tramp, Tramp, Tramp the Boys Are Marching-1924
Gopher Spinach 1954
programme.desc: Popeye battles a gopher over his precious spinach plants.

programme.title: Felix in the Bone Age-1922
programme.desc: Felix comes upon a caveman and his girlfriend. The girlfriend is crying, and when the caveman asks her what she wants, she points to Felix. The caveman chases Felix, who escapes by using the tails of some friendly monkeys to make his way down a steep cliff. Later he makes friends with a baby monkey, but winds up getting in a fight with a huge gorilla.

programme.title: Popeye's 20th Anniversary 1954
programme.desc: Popeye is being honored for his 20 years of films, in a dinner hosted by 'Bob Hope' (several other celebrities are present, like 'Jimmy Durante', Bing Crosby, 'Jerry Lewis' and 'Dean Martin'). When called on to make a speech, he instead shows clips from two of his movies. Bluto does a slow burn through this, finally stuffing Popeye's trophy onto Popeye's head - but the trophy is full of spinach, so Popeye clobbers Bluto.

programme.title: Scotty Finds a Home 1935
programme.desc: A young anthropomorphic kitten wants a pet. He happens to find a puppy with no owner and takes him in. When the Scotty tracks mud into the house, Grandma says that her grandson cannot keep him. A transient bulldog is walking by as Grandma puts a pie in the windowsill to cool. He barges into the house and terrorizes the family, demanding they feed him. Scotty rushes back to the house and saves the family, causing Grandma to decide that they can keep him after all.

programme.title: Dog Gone South 1950
programme.desc: Ever in search of a master, no matter how unwilling, Charlie winds up on a plantation down South and tries to force himself on the owner, a Confederate Colonel. Unfortunately, the Colonel already has a pet bulldog, "Belvedere."

programme.title: Aladdin(Mel-O-Toons) 1960
programme.desc: In this adaptation of the Arabian Nights tale, poor Aladdin discovers a magic lamp containing a genie who grants his wish to marry a princess.

programme.title: Boy Meets Dog 1938
programme.desc: A commercial short made for the Bristol-Myers Co. (plugging their toothpaste) that features the characters from the "Reg'lar Fellers" syndicated newspaper comic strip by Gene Byrnes. The plot concerns a boy who has an old grouch for a daddy, runs off, meets a dog and joins a gang of kids. Meanwhile,the old man has a nightmare,where he sees himself as an old sour puss because he doesn't take care of his teeth and gums. He sees an electric sign for Bristol-Myers toothpaste, and that sets him on a more positive course. (The few-seconds of film showing the sign represents the only commercial intrusion in this short)

programme.title: Now Hear This 1962
programme.desc: In this very abstract cartoon, a hard-of-hearing old Britisher finds a red horn and uses it as a megaphone, unaware that it is really a lost horn from the Devil's forehead. The Britisher finds that the horn has the effect of amplifying every sound psychedelically and causing him serious bodily harm

programme.title: Small Fry-1939
programme.desc: Junior wants to be a Big Fry, but learns the hard way that he just isn't ready for smoking in the pool room when he should be in the school room.

programme.title: Bride and Gloom
programme.desc: Popeye is marrying Olive tomorrow; he's ecstatic. She has a dream of the future, including twin sons who prove to be a real handful. When Popeye comes by the next morning, he gets a frosty reception

programme.title: Noah's Ark 1959
programme.desc: Noah gets the word: build an ark in seven days. His sons cut the necessary trees in three days, and much furious sawing and hammering follows. But there's no rest, as they need to round up all the animals. Noah boards the animals, then his sons, their wives, and his wife (who packed a ferocious picnic). The rains and flood begin. The animals soon develop cabin fever and get restless, but Mrs. Noah has the answer: "Music has charms to soothe the savage beast." His sons find instruments and begin playing; everyone dances. But Harry the hippo dances with everyone but his wife; Noah goes to her, and while she tells him not to mention Harry's name, Noah convinces her that Harry is thinking only of her. The rains end; Noah sends a dove out who brings back an olive branch. They land on Mount Ararat and disembark.

programme.title: The Weakly Reporter 1944
programme.desc: A newsreel spoof with WWII homefront gags, including rationing, air raid drills and women filling in men's jobs.

programme.title: Fox Pop 1942
programme.desc: Hearing that silver foxes are all the rage in high society, a fox paints himself silver and gets himself trapped, finding out too late that it's only his fur anyone is interested in

programme.title: Cad and Caddy- 1947
programme.desc: Lulu plans her revenge against a distressed golfer who refuses to give her a lollipop after he promised her one for caddieing for him

programme.title: Spooky Swabs 1957
programme.desc: Popeye and Olive are shipwrecked; they think they are saved when they see a ship, but what they don't realize is that the crew of the Sea Witch is all ghosts, and soon they are under attack, but they don't know from what for a while

programme.title: Fresh Airedale 1945
programme.desc: In his master's eyes, "good old Shep" is the perfect dog, but the cat knows he's really a two-faced mutt who can be bought off with a bone by a burglar, and then take credit for it when the cat chases the crook off. But then Shep becomes obsessed by a newspaper story proclaiming a real canine hero the nation's "No. 1 Dog."

programme.title: popeye's 20th anniversary (1080)
programme.desc: Popeye is being honored for his 20 years of films at a dinner hosted by 'Bob Hope' (several other celebrities are present, like 'Jimmy Durante', 'Bing Crosby', 'Jerry Lewis' and 'Dean Martin'). When called on to make a speech, Popeye instead shows clips from two of his movies. programme.title: No Noise-1923
programme.desc: The gang pays Mickey a visit at the hospital. They switch vaccination orders with another group of kids, but the staff catches on and gives them false diseases to worry about.

programme.title: Big Business-1924
programme.desc: In need of some fun (and a haircut), rich kid Mickie pays a visit to the gang's barbershop.

programme.title: Sing a Song of Six Pants 1947
programme.desc: The stooges are tailors, and are heavily in debt to the Skin & Flint finance company. When the boys read about the big reward for a fugitive robber, they think it could be the answer to their problems. The bank robber conveniently ducks into their shop and leaves a suit with a safe combination. After his girl friend fails to retrieve it, the robber returns with gang and a wild fight ensues. The boys miss out on the reward but wind up with the crook's bankroll and can pay their creditors.

programme.title: His Wedding Night 1917
programme.desc: In a drugstore Al and Roscoe are rivals for Alice. Roscoe slings melons and operates the gas pump. Buster delivers a wedding gown for Alice, begins modeling it, is mistaken for Alice and is kidnapped by Al.

programme.title: His New Job -915
programme.desc: Charlie is trying to get a job in a movie. After causing difficulty on the set, he is told to help the carpenter. When one of the actors doesn't show, Charlie is given a chance to act but instead enters a dice game. When he does finally act, he ruins the scene, wrecks the set, and tears the skirt from the star.

programme.title: His Prehistoric Past-1914
programme.desc: Charlie dreams he is in the Stone Age, where King Low-Brow rules a harem of wives. Charlie, in skins and a bowler, falls in love with the king's favorite wife, Sum-Babee. During a hunting trip the king is pushed over a cliff. Charlie proclaims himself king, but Ku-Ku discovers the real king alive. They return to find Charlie and Sum-Babee together.

programme.title: The Littlest Angel 1969
programme.desc: In The Littlest Angel, the beloved holiday story comes to life in a touching musical special. Jerry Skinner stars as a small boy who enters heaven but struggles to fit in among the angels. Longing for the simple joys of his earthly life, he offers a humble gift that becomes the most treasured of all. With heartfelt songs, tender performances, and a timeless message of love and faith, this family favorite captures the true spirit of Christmas.

programme.title: Don't Open Til Christmas 1984
programme.desc: In Don’t Open Till Christmas, holiday cheer turns to terror on the streets of London when a masked killer begins targeting anyone dressed as Santa Claus. As the bodies pile up, a determined detective races against time to unmask the murderer before Christmas Eve becomes a nightmare. With grisly twists, chilling suspense, and a sinister holiday atmosphere, this cult slasher proves that not every gift under the tree brings joy.

programme.title: Scrooge 1932
programme.desc: In Scrooge, Seymour Hicks brings Charles Dickens’ immortal Ebenezer Scrooge to life in one of the earliest sound versions of A Christmas Carol. On a cold Christmas Eve, the miserly Scrooge is visited by the ghost of his late partner, Jacob Marley, and three spirits who reveal the shadows of his past, present, and future. Faced with his own greed and the suffering it causes, Scrooge must choose between a lonely grave and redemption. Atmospheric and faithful to Dickens’ classic tale, this 1932 adaptation delivers timeless holiday magic and a powerful message of compassion.

programme.title: The Great Commandment 1939
programme.desc: In The Great Commandment, a stirring tale of faith and sacrifice unfolds in the days of Roman-occupied Judea. When young Joel defies his father’s wishes and joins the Zealots in their fight against tyranny, he soon encounters a teacher whose message of love and forgiveness changes his path forever. Blending history, drama, and spiritual awakening, this powerful film explores the struggle between violence and compassion—and the timeless call to live by the greatest commandment of all.

programme.title: Romance on the Range 1942
programme.desc: Roy Rogers brings song and spirit to Romance on the Range! When cattle rustlers stir up trouble on the frontier, Roy saddles up to protect the ranchers and bring the outlaws to justice. Along the way, his courage and charm win more than just gunfights, as romance blossoms under the wide-open skies. With the Sons of the Pioneers providing harmony and plenty of action on the trail, this Western blends music, adventure, and heart in true Roy Rogers style.

programme.title: Bonanza - S1E21: The Spanish Grant

programme.title: Bonanza - S1E26: The Avenger

programme.title: Unrolled
programme.desc: Tucked away on 22 St at the heart of Ybor City, The Cabrera family opened a boutique Cigar shop in 2014. Ten years later, owner Vladimir Cabrera reflects on his personal journey and family business while showcasing a vast selection of premium cigars from around the world. Tune in to discover why Tampero Cigars is a straight cut above the rest!

programme.title: Behind the Blend
programme.desc: Join host Sean Mobley as he sits down with the esteemed cigar maker, Bella Dama, offering unique insights into the meticulous art of blending and the dedication required to craft exceptional cigars. Discover the inspiration behind Bella Dama's signature creations and gain a deeper appreciation for the nuances that define a truly remarkable smoke.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: On this episode of Burn Rate, host Bryan Baiss is joined by cigar expert Kyle Lenz to review the Ashton cigar. They dive into its smooth, refined flavors, flawless construction, and overall smoking experience, sharing their thoughts on what makes Ashton a staple in the world of cigars.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: On this episode of Burn Rate, host Bryan Baiss is joined by cigar aficionado Kyle Lenz to review the bold Cromagnon cigar. Together, they explore its rich, intense flavors, perfect draw, and overall experience, offering their expert opinions on why this cigar stands out in its category.

programme.title: Texas Cigar Roadshow
programme.desc: In this episode, Stephen and I enjoy cigars or pipes, drinks, and share some cigar news. We‚Äôll also feature a Cigar Word from Micallef and a Cigar Tip from Erez cigars. Dave Yancey joins us for a pairing of Lovely Cigars from Green Bay, WI with Michters Small Batch American whiskey. Plus, a Shop Stop at Mi Casa Cigars and Lounge near Tampa, FL.

programme.title: Texas Cigar Roadshow
programme.desc: In this episode, we are visited by Stephen Rast of Tobacco Cabana to sit down and talk about something that is near and dear to us... the care of our beloved humidors during the winter months.

programme.title: The Burn Down Podcast
programme.desc: We‚Äôre reviewing the top cigar news stories of 2023 while taste-testing our new Connecticut blend cigar. From exciting highlights in the cigar world to the anticipation of our next blend, it‚Äôs an episode packed with great insights and flavors you won‚Äôt want to miss!

programme.title: Creekside Cigar Co.
programme.desc: This Creekside Cigar Co podcast episode answers viewer questions and debunks cigar myths, such as the white ash signifying quality and the legend of cigars being rolled on virgins' thighs.

programme.desc: Sienna está desesperada por ganar un gran premio en metálico en un concurso secreto clandestino, pero los dinosaurios comienzan a cazarla para entretenimiento de los ricos y adinerados. ¿Podrá ser la última en sobrevivir a la horrible noche para ganar el premio?

programme.title: Kecksburg
programme.desc: Un reportero investiga un misterioso accidente y descubre algo más que un objeto, sino una enorme conspiración gubernamental. Inspirada en los hechos reales del 9 de diciembre de 1965 y en uno de los incidentes OVNI más misteriosos de Estados Unidos...

programme.title: El Culto de Humpty Dumpty
programme.desc: Un grupo de adolescentes con problemas y su maestra deben luchar por sobrevivir después de descubrir que una secta ha devuelto la vida a Humpty Dumpty, un muñeco asesino, y lo ha liberado en el campamento en el que se encuentran...

programme.title: Asesinos Sin Ley
programme.desc: Mickey y Jenny son imigrantes indocumentados, un dia el patrón de Jenny trata de abusar de ella, Mickey lo sorprende y lo mata haceindo justicia por su propia mano así se desatan una cacería de criminales abusadores, todo lo sueben a las redes convirtiéndose en los anti-héroes más populares por hacer justicia a los desamparados.

programme.title: El Gavilán Justiciero
programme.desc: Historia llena de acción donde la codicia y la ambición desatan la más cruenta lucha, que trae como consecuencia el sufrimiento de una familia y la envidia de otra.

programme.title: Somos Pobres
programme.desc: Una familia muy pobre espera la Navidad con gran entusiasmo para celebrar y ver lo que les trae Santa Claus. Los niños van al cerro a cortar un árbol y decorarlo para poner los regalos que les traerá su padre después de vender la cosecha. Sin embargo, cuando el padre llega, está borracho y sin dinero, destrozando el árbol y golpeando a sus hijos. Uno de ellos decide huir de casa y, más tarde, entra en el negocio de las drogas.

programme.title: Vidas Violentas
programme.desc: integrada por seis cortometrajes escritos y dirigidos por seis de los más connotados directores mexicanos, la película fue realizada y dirigida para concientizar y reducir la violencia de género, el acoso escolar en las escuelas y la violencia doméstica. Proviene de una iniciativa del gobierno en el marco de la campaña basta no violencia

programme.title: Despertar El Polvo
programme.desc: Es la historia de un hombre que ha sufrido las desgracias de vivir una vida trasgredida por la delincuencia y corrupción, el barrio de Iztapalapa es el escenario donde vaga por las calles, invisible, ignorado y solitario, sumido en su miseria. Un evento desafortunado mueve el instinto protector de Chano que intenta regresar al mundo del crimen para lograr sacar a su ahijado de la cárcel.

programme.title: De La Piel del Diablo
programme.desc: La atracción se desata entre un hombre y una mujer que se conocen en una galería de arte. Comparten gustos y aficiones, y ambos parecen ser justo lo que el otro necesita… pero lo que debería haber sido una noche de pasión, pronto se convertirá en un juego perverso, lleno de trampas y mentiras, en el que nada es lo que parece.

programme.title: El Ultimo Verano
programme.desc: Carlos es un Profesor de universidad a punto de jubilarse, pero su futuro se ve en peligro porque una de sus alumnas lo acusa de haber sido acosada. Esto es solo el inicio de la peor racha de su vida ya que Carlos descubre que su esposa lo engaña y que la vida que el creía perfecta se esfuma poco a poco de sus manos... tal vez sea el ultimo verano en la vida de Carlos

programme.title: La Sangre Iluminada
programme.desc: Seis personajes explican su compleja existencia entrelazada. Cada cierto tiempo, debido a matemáticas inexplicables, la vida de estos personajes cambia y ocupan el cuerpo de otro

programme.title: Inquebrantable
programme.desc: Lupita vive en Ciudad Juárez con su hija Margarita, el esposo de Margarita es un alcohólico, mujeriego, y golpeador, la hija de Lupita, Margarita va a la universidad pero desde niña tiene una enfermedad de un mal cardiaco causado por la violencia domestica que ha sufrido desde niña, el doctor Villa le comenta a Lupita que Margarita su hija va a morir si no tiene un donante de corazón, desesperada ella se pone a vender cualquier cosa de valor que tenga en su casa para comprar el corazón en el mercado negro.

programme.title: Vecinos del Terror
programme.desc: Por accidente se les dispara un arma con el impacto matan al cuñado quien después regresa de ultratumba a cobrar venganza y ni la policía se escapa de la venganza de ultratumba
